entries.phrase_20: That massive quake. It must have damaged the holo-generators. We have got to get this place under control as quickly as possible.
entries.phrase_19: I hope everyone else is OK. I keep feeling tremors. It seems like the entire complex is ready to collapse at any moment.
entries.phrase_18: It's all gone wrong. There's chaos everywhere! We've got to get out of here!
entries.phrase_17: The tremor we just had must have scrambled our security circuits. The sentry droids are attacking anything that moves now!
entries.phrase_16: Where did that Imperial Inspector go? Everything was working fine until he came snooping around.
entries.phrase_15: Be careful. Ever since that earthquake, parts of the ceiling have started caving in. Some rooms are blocked off by debris.
entries.phrase_14: There's just no way. If I find out who is responsible for this, I swear...
entries.phrase_13: I'm glad you're here. Can you help me? Can you help us get out? Can you kill those things? Please!
entries.phrase_12: I just want to leave. I want to get out of here, but those creatures are roaming the halls. They'll kill me for sure.
entries.phrase_11: Dead... they're all dead. I saw them. I saw them get killed by those... things we made.
entries.phrase_10: Spiders... klik-niks... I never want to see another one as long as I live. I'll have nightmares for the rest of my life as it is.
entries.phrase_9: Have you seen them yet? If you see them, run away... as fast as you can. It's the only way to stay alive.
entries.phrase_8: Monsters... we made monsters. I never knew... never knew they were so... so capable.
entries.phrase_7: The blast... the screams... the noise. I can't get them out of my head. It's driving me crazy.
entries.phrase_6: There was an Imperial officer running around a while ago, but I haven't seen him since that huge blast. I wonder where he went.
entries.phrase_5: Who knew that those creations we were working on would be so violent. Powerful, yes... but it seems they almost enjoyed killing...
entries.phrase_4: Did you feel the earthquake? I think that's what started all this. We should have built extra precautions, but we never expected... this.
entries.phrase_3: I remember... an earthquake. Or was it an attack? It's all so blurry now, but I can still hear it in my head.
entries.phrase_2: I'm scared... so scared. My friends and co-workers... killed.
entries.phrase_1: They've all escaped, most of them anyway. Those monsters are vicious and deadly. We're lucky to be alive!
entries.phrase_0: How... how did this happen? There's no way. It's impossible.
